tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE grant_evaluation_criteria (
    criterion_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    criterion_name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    weight FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE scoring_rubrics (
 rubric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 criterion_id INT,
 rubric_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 score_range VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
 description TEXT,
 FOREIGN KEY (criterion_id) REFERENCES evaluation_criteria(criterion_id)
);

CREATE TABLE evaluation_scores (
 evaluation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 rubric_id INT,
 score INT NOT NULL,
 comments TEXT,
 FOREIGN KEY (rubric_id) REFERENCES scoring_rubrics(rubric_id)
);
